text: Good morning, sir. May I see your passport and booking reference, please?
Thank you, Mr. Lewis. I can see you're on flight BA678 to London Heathrow, departing at 10:45. Would you like a window or aisle seat?
Certainly. I've allocated you seat 14A, which is by the window. Are you checking in any luggage today?

Perfect. Please place it on the belt. Your allowance is 23 kilograms. It weighs 19.5 kilograms, so that's fine. Here's your boarding pass. Boarding starts at 10:15 from Gate B24. Have a pleasant flight.
Good afternoon. Passport, please. What is the purpose of your visit to the United Kingdom?
I see. And how long are you planning to stay in the UK?
Where will you be staying during your visit?
And what company do you work for?
Is this your first visit to the UK?
Very well. Do you have anything to declare? Any goods over the duty-free allowance?
That's fine. Welcome to the United Kingdom. Enjoy your stay.
Please remove your laptop and any liquids from your bag. Place them in a separate tray.
Is this your bag, sir? We need to check it. There seems to be something metallic inside.
Ah yes, it's a power bank. That's fine. You're all clear. Have a good flight.
Good afternoon. You must be from STU Trailer. Please, take a seat. We're looking forward to hearing about your products.
Excellent. So, what can you tell us about your concrete mixer range?
That's interesting. What's the drum rotation speed, and what kind of discharge rate can we expect?
Very good. And what about the hydraulic system? Is it compatible with standard European truck connections?
Excellent. That all sounds very promising. Could you send us a detailed quotation by next Friday?
Good morning! Thank you for the invitation to visit your facility. I've been looking forward to seeing your production process.
This is impressive. Can you tell me about this welding station? What process do you use?
I see. And what quality control measures do you have in place?
That's reassuring. What's your typical lead time from order to delivery?
This is a lovely restaurant. I come here quite often. Have you decided what you'd like to order?
The lamb is excellent here. By the way, how was your journey from Konya? I imagine it's quite a long trip.
Would you like some wine with dinner? They have an excellent selection here.
Of course, no problem at all. So tell me, how did you get into the trailer manufacturing business?
Bit grey today, isn't it? Typical British weather, I'm afraid. Is it very different in Turkey?
I've always wanted to visit Turkey. Any plans for the weekend while you're here?
Oh, the British Museum is brilliant. Free entry too! Do you follow football at all?
I'm a Manchester United fan, for my sins! Anyway, shall we head back? I think they're ready to continue.
Hello, Thompson Engineering, Sarah speaking. How can I help you?
Of course. Let me check his diary. When would suit you best?
Tuesday the 17th looks good. Would 10 o'clock work? We'll need about two hours, I imagine.
Excellent. I'll send you a calendar invite and directions to our office. Is there anything you'll need for the presentation?
Good evening, sir. Welcome to the Grand Hotel Manchester. Do you have a reservation?
Yes, here it is. A standard room for three nights. Would you prefer a higher floor or a quieter room at the back?
No problem. I've put you in room 412 on the fourth floor, nice and quiet. Breakfast is served from 6:30 to 10. Is there anything else you need to know?
Yes, the gym is on the ground floor, open 24 hours. The Wi-Fi password is on a card in your room. Enjoy your stay!
Good afternoon. How can I help you today?
I'm sorry about that. There's been a technical issue with the aircraft. We're expecting a delay of approximately two hours.
Unfortunately, this is the only direct flight today. However, we can offer you a meal voucher for the wait. Would that help?
You can use it at any restaurant in Terminal 3. We'll announce boarding as soon as the aircraft is ready. Apologies again for the inconvenience.
Reception, how may I assist you?
I'm terribly sorry to hear that, sir. Could you describe what's happening? Is it not turning on at all, or is it making a noise?
I understand. I can send our maintenance team up right away, or I can offer you a different room on the same floor. Which would you prefer?
Of course. I have room 418 available, which is an identical room with a city view. I'll send someone up to help you move. Again, my sincere apologies.
So, let's talk numbers. What kind of pricing are we looking at for a bulk order of curtainsiders?
That's a bit higher than we were hoping. Our current supplier offers similar specs at €26,000. Can you match that?
The warranty is appealing. If we commit to 20 units this year, what's the best you can do?
That sounds reasonable. And what about payment terms? We typically work on 60-day terms.
That works for us. Shall we put together a formal proposal then?
Good evening! Welcome to The Crown. Are you ready to order, or would you like a few more minutes?
Today's pie is steak and ale - it's very popular. Comes with mash and gravy. Can I get you some drinks while you decide?
Excellent choice. And for your colleagues?
It's beer-battered. Lovely and crispy. So that's one pie, one fish and chips. I'll bring your drinks right away.
Good morning, Harrison Parts, Claire speaking. How can I help?
Let me pull that up... Yes, I can see it here. It looks like there was a delay at our warehouse. I'm sorry about that. It's scheduled to ship today.
I completely understand. Would express shipping help? We could upgrade to next-day delivery at no extra cost to make up for the delay.
Yes, it should arrive Thursday morning your time. I'll email you the tracking number within the hour. Is there anything else I can help with?
This is impressive. Can you walk me through your quality management system? What certifications do you hold?
Good to hear. How do you handle non-conformances? What happens if a defect is found during production?
I noticed you use both robotic and manual welding. How do you ensure consistent weld quality across both methods?
Very thorough. One last question - what's your defect rate, and how has it trended over the past year?
Quite a busy show this year, isn't it? I don't think we've met. I'm James, from Axle Solutions.
Turkey! Interesting. The Turkish trailer industry has grown enormously. What type of trailers do you specialise in?
We supply axles and suspension systems to trailer manufacturers. Actually, we might be able to work together. Do you source your axles locally or import them?
We distribute BPW and SAF-Holland. Look, I'd love to chat more, but I need to get back to the stand. Could I give you my card?
Right, so tell me about this tipper. We need something robust for aggregate transport. What's the body capacity?
Hardox is good. What about the tipping mechanism? We've had issues with slow tipping times in the past.
That's decent. What's the unladen weight? We need to maximise payload.
Good payload. One more thing - what warranty do you offer, and do you have service support in the UK?
Hello there! Where can I take you today?
The Grand Hotel, yes I know it well. That'll be about 25 pounds. Should take around 20 minutes depending on traffic. Is that alright?
Yes, card is fine. So, business or pleasure? You sound like you've travelled a fair way.
Turkey, lovely! Right, here we are - the Grand Hotel. That's 24 pounds on the meter. Shall I get your bag from the boot?
Good morning, sir. Checking out today?
Let me pull up your bill. That's three nights, plus the restaurant charges and minibar. The total comes to £485.
Of course. Let me check... You're right, that was a system error. I'll remove it. The new total is £467. How would you like to pay?
Certainly. Here's your receipt. Is there anything else I can help with? Do you need transport to the airport?
I'll book one for 11:30, that should give you plenty of time. It'll wait outside the main entrance. Have a safe journey!
Thanks for coming in, Lewis. So, where are we with our order? The 15 curtainsiders we ordered last month.
Good to hear. We did have one concern though - your quality manager mentioned there was a weld issue on a previous batch. Has that been addressed?
That's reassuring. Now, regarding delivery - we're a bit concerned about the timeline. Can you still hit the March 15th deadline?
Excellent. One more thing - we're considering increasing next quarter's order to 25 units. Would that be feasible for you?
That was a lovely meal. Shall we get the bill?
Oh, that's very kind of you. Are you sure? I'm happy to split it.
Well, thank you very much. That's very generous. I've really enjoyed this evening.
Definitely. Right, I should probably head off - early start tomorrow. Thank you again for dinner.
Good morning, David Richards speaking.
Oh, that's a shame. What's happened?
These things happen. Don't worry about it. When would you be able to reschedule?
Thursday morning would actually work better for me. Shall we say 10 o'clock?
Morning! The coffee here is quite good, isn't it?
Yes, I'm visiting a supplier in the area. What about you? Your accent - let me guess, somewhere Mediterranean?
Trailers? That's interesting. I'm in logistics myself - we run a haulage company. Always looking for reliable equipment.
Mostly curtainsiders, actually. We buy about 10 new ones a year. Here's my card - give me a call if you'd like to discuss further.
Thank you for visiting STU Trailer. Before we start the tour, I believe there's a safety briefing?
Of course. What do we need to know?
Understood. Are there any particular hazards we should be aware of?
Good to know. And if there's an emergency?
Thank you for that presentation. I have a question about the axle configuration. Can you use disc brakes instead of drum brakes on your trailers?
Good to know. Another question - what's the typical lifespan of your trailer floors? We've had issues with rotting on other brands.
Impressive. One more - do you have crash test certification for the rear underrun protection?
That would be helpful. Are there any other questions from the floor? No? Well, thank you all for your attention.
Good evening, sir. How can I help you?
I'm sorry to hear that. Can you describe your bag for me? Size, colour, any distinguishing features?
Thank you. And do you have your baggage claim ticket? It should be attached to your boarding pass.
Perfect. We'll track it down. Where are you staying? We can deliver it once it's located.
Good afternoon, sir. How may I assist you today?
Of course. What type of cuisine does your client prefer? We have excellent Italian, British, and Asian options within walking distance.
I'd recommend The Ivy. Excellent British menu, beautiful setting, very popular with business clients. Shall I make a reservation for you?
Certainly. And would you like me to arrange anything else? Theatre tickets perhaps, or a car service?
Good evening. Are you ready to order, or do you have any questions about the menu?
Of course, no problem at all. The lamb shank, the grilled salmon, and the chicken supreme are all pork-free. Would any of those interest you?
The lamb is slow-cooked in a rosemary and garlic jus - no wine. It comes with roasted vegetables and mashed potato. Shall I put that order in for you?
Certainly. Sparkling water and the lamb shank. I'll make a note about your dietary requirements for the kitchen. Is there anything else?
Right, I think we've covered everything. Before we sign, shall we just run through the key terms one more time?
That's correct. And the warranty is 3 years on the chassis, 2 years on everything else. One last thing - what happens if there are any quality issues after delivery?
That's reassuring. I'm happy with everything. I think we have a deal.
Indeed. Let me sign here... and here. There we go. Welcome aboard! Shall we celebrate with a drink?
Morning Lewis! Good to see you again. Did you have a good weekend? Did you get to do anything nice while you were here?
The British Museum is wonderful, isn't it? I spent the weekend with the family - took the kids to a football match on Sunday. Do you follow football?
We saw Manchester City play. They won 3-1, so the kids were happy! Anyway, shall we grab a coffee before the others arrive?
How do you take yours? Milk? Sugar?
Hello, Mike Stevens speaking.
Ah yes, perfect timing. Go ahead.
That's correct, except we'd like to change the colour to RAL 5010 blue. Is that possible at this stage?
No, that's everything. When can we expect delivery?
This is an impressive facility. What's your annual production capacity here?
That's substantial. If we were to place a large order - say 100 units - what would the lead time be?
What if we needed to rush an order? Can you expedite production if we pay extra?
Good to know. And your workforce - do you have enough skilled workers to maintain quality at high volumes?
Good afternoon! Welcome to Europcar. Do you have a reservation?
Yes, here it is. A Ford Focus for four days, returning Sunday. Can I see your driving licence and a credit card for the deposit?
Both would be great, thank you. Now, would you like to add a GPS navigation system? It's £8 per day.
Yes, all UK and European maps. One last thing - the fuel policy is full-to-full. Please return it with a full tank to avoid refuelling charges. Any questions?
This curtainsider looks well-built. Can you show us how the sliding roof works?
That is smooth. What about the curtain tensioning system? We've had problems with loose curtains on other trailers.
Impressive. And the floor - is it suitable for forklift loading?
Very thorough. Do you have any literature we can take away? Spec sheets, pricing?
Sorry I'm late. The M6 was absolutely dreadful this morning. Roadworks everywhere!
It is notorious! Do you drive much when you're here, or do you prefer the train?
The trains are good, yes. How do you find driving on the left? Must be quite an adjustment!
Ha! I can imagine. Oh, looks like the others are arriving now. Shall we head to the meeting room?
Room service, good evening. How can I help you?
Of course, Mr Lewis. What would you like this evening?
Certainly. The grilled chicken with vegetables and a side salad. Any drinks with that?
Of course. So that's grilled chicken, side salad, and tea with milk. It'll be with you in about 25 minutes. Is there anything else?
Hello, this is James from Fleet Solutions. I submitted a warranty claim for one of our trailers last week and haven't heard back. Can you help?
It's WC-2024-0847. The issue is with the rear door hinges - they're not closing properly.
That's a relief. Will someone come to fit them, or do we need to arrange that ourselves?
That's excellent service, thank you. Mornings work better for us. Can you send me a confirmation email?
Good morning. I'm Sarah Mitchell, Quality Assurance Manager from TransportCo. We're here for the factory inspection we arranged.
Thank you. I'd like to see your welding stations first, and understand your quality control checkpoints. How do you ensure weld consistency?
Impressive. I notice you're using robotic welding here. What happens if the robot detects an anomaly?
Very thorough. One more thing - can I see your traceability records? We need to ensure full component traceability for our fleet.
This is a lovely restaurant. Thank you for the invitation, Lewis.
The fish does look tempting. What are you going to have?
Sparkling water would be lovely. This is very generous of you. Shall we discuss the project details while we wait for the food?
That's excellent news! Oh, the food is here. This looks delicious. Shall we continue our discussion after lunch?
Thank you for coming in today. Before we discuss potential collaboration, could you tell us a bit about STU Trailer?
Impressive. What would you say sets you apart from other manufacturers in the market?
That's good to know. Do you have any existing presence in the UK market?
I appreciate the honesty. What kind of partnership model are you looking for?
Is this your first time in the UK, Lewis? What do you make of it so far?
Ha! Yes, we do love our queues. Is queueing not such a big thing in Turkey?
That's fascinating. What about food? Have you tried any traditional British dishes?
You should try a proper cream tea if you get the chance! Oh, looks like the session is starting again. Nice chatting with you.
That's fine, it happens all the time. Pop those in the tray and go through again. Have a good flight.
Now that we've agreed on the order, let's discuss delivery. How do you usually handle shipping from Turkey?
RoRo sounds efficient. What about customs clearance? Will we need to handle that ourselves?
That's helpful. And if we need to track the shipment, is there a system for that?
Excellent. One last thing - what happens if there are any delays or damage during transit?
Hello, this is Dave from Northern Haulage. We've got an issue with one of your curtainsiders - the EBS warning light keeps coming on.
It's a solid light, comes on after about 10 minutes of driving. The brakes seem to work fine otherwise.
Hang on, let me check... Actually yes, there's a cable hanging loose on the nearside rear. Looks like it's been caught on something.
Brilliant, we'll sort that out now. Thanks for your help - saved us a garage visit!
Good morning. I'm calling from Smith Transport in Leeds. We're looking for new curtainsiders. Do you supply to the UK?
We need five standard curtainsiders, 13.6 metres. What's your lead time and roughly what price are we looking at?
That sounds reasonable. Yes, please send a quote. My email is j.smith@smithtransport.co.uk.
Yes, include delivery please. My direct number is 0113 555 7890. Look forward to your email.
Good morning, sir. How can I help you today?
Of course. The network name is "HotelGuest" and the password is on this card. It's valid for your entire stay. Is the connection for work purposes?
The WiFi should be fine, but if you need a guaranteed connection, we have a business centre on the first floor with high-speed ethernet and private meeting rooms.
It's complimentary for guests. There's a printer, scanner, and two private pods you can use. No booking needed - just turn up. Would you like me to show you where it is?
Good afternoon, The Grill Room. How may I help you?
Friday evening, party of four. What time would you like? We have availability at 7pm or 8:30pm.
Certainly, I can seat you in our Garden Room - it's quieter. May I take a name and contact number for the booking?
Perfect. So that's Friday at 7pm, party of four, Garden Room, under Lewis. We'll send a confirmation to your mobile. Is there anything else?
Hello Lewis, can you hear me? Your video seems to be frozen.
Yes, that's much better now. Right, shall we get started? Can you give us an update on the production schedule?
That's great to hear. We noticed a slight change in the specification sheet you sent. Can you clarify what's different?
No problem, that sounds fine. Before we wrap up, is there anything else you need from our side?
That was a very informative tour. I'm impressed with your facilities. Shall we sit down and discuss what we've seen?
Coffee would be lovely, thanks. Now, I was particularly impressed by your paint shop. Can you tell me more about the coating process?
That's reassuring. One concern we have is after-sales support in the UK. How would that work?
That sounds comprehensive. So, what would be the next step if we wanted to proceed?
Right, we've got the trailers. Before we put them into service, what do we need to know about daily checks?
That's helpful. What about the sliding roof? Any special instructions for operating it?
Got it. And what about regular maintenance? What's the service schedule?
Perfect. One last thing - if something goes wrong on the road, who do we call?
Did you catch the match last night? Liverpool against Manchester City - what a game!
It ended 2-2, very tense! I'm a Liverpool fan myself. Do you follow any English teams?
Galatasaray - yes, I've heard of them! They play in Europe sometimes, don't they? The atmosphere at Turkish matches looks incredible.
I'd love that! Right, we should probably get back to business. But let's definitely talk more about football over dinner later.
Could I have an aisle seat, please?
I'm travelling on business
Where can I collect my luggage?
I'd like to declare these items
Could you tell me the way to...?
My flight has been delayed
I've booked a transfer to the hotel
Is there anywhere to charge my phone?
I'll be staying for three days
Could I have a receipt for this, please?
I have a reservation under the name...
Could I have a room with a view?
What time is breakfast served?
Could you arrange a wake-up call?
I'd like to extend my stay
How long does it take to get to...?
Could you drop me off at...?
I'm having trouble with...
Where's the nearest currency exchange?
I need to catch a connecting flight
I'd like to walk you through the specifications
The load capacity is rated at...
This model features a hydraulic system that...
Could you clarify what you mean by...?
Let me check with our engineering team
The delivery timeline would be approximately...
This complies with EU regulations
Would you like me to prepare a detailed quotation?
The chassis is constructed from high-strength steel
What are your requirements in terms of...?
I'll send you the technical drawings
Could we schedule a factory visit?
The turning radius is optimised for...
We can customise this to your specifications
Let me demonstrate how this works
I think there might be a misunderstanding
Let me see if I've understood correctly
I'll look into it and get back to you
Compared to the previous model, this offers...
The warranty covers...
It's lovely to finally meet you in person
How was your journey?
Shall we grab a bite to eat?
I'll have whatever you're having
This is on me
I'm not fussy about food
Could I get the bill, please?
What do you do when you're not working?
I'm afraid I don't drink alcohol
It's been a pleasure doing business with you
The weather's been rather unpredictable lately
I must say, that was absolutely delicious
Would you mind if we split the bill?
I couldn't possibly eat another bite
Let's keep in touch
I was wondering if you'd like to...
That sounds absolutely lovely
Shall we say around seven?
Could you repeat that, please? I didn't quite catch it
I really appreciate you taking the time
We might be able to offer a discount if...
What sort of budget are you working with?
I'm writing to follow up on our meeting
Shall we move on to the next item?
We're happy to proceed on those terms
What are your payment terms?
Please find attached...
Would it be convenient to schedule a call?
When would you need this by?
Just to confirm, we agreed on...
I apologise for the delay in getting back to you
Allow me to introduce myself
I look forward to hearing from you
I was referred to you by...
This is a matter of some urgency
I'm just looking, thank you
Would you mind if I...?
I'm afraid I'm not from around here
I'm afraid they're not available at the moment
I'm terribly sorry, I didn't mean to...
Could I have a flat white, please?
I'd rather have... if you don't mind
I'm feeling a bit under the weather
Excuse me, is this the queue for...?
That's very kind of you
Do you mind if I sit here?
Could you give me a hand with this?
Lovely day, isn't it?
It was lovely to see you
I'm afraid I've already got plans
I think we can find a middle ground
Could I add something to that?
Thank you for your time today
We'd like to propose the following...
I wanted to touch base regarding...
Is this seat taken?
Do you have this in a different size?
You can't miss it
I really couldn't have done it without you
Take care of yourself
Good morning. I'd like to check in for my flight to Istanbul, please.
Could I have a window seat, please? I'd prefer one near the front if possible.
I'm afraid I only have hand luggage. Will that fit in the overhead locker?
Excuse me, where can I find the departure gate for flight BA seven two three?
Could you tell me how long it takes to get through security?
I believe my connecting flight has been delayed. What are my options?
I'm here on business. I'll be staying for approximately one week.
The purpose of my visit is to attend a trade fair in Birmingham.
I'll be staying at the Hilton Hotel in central London.
Excuse me, I think there might be a problem with my baggage. It hasn't arrived.
Could you please check if my suitcase is on the next flight?
I'd like to hire a car for three days. Do you have anything available?
What's the best way to get to the city centre from here?
Is there a direct train to Manchester, or do I need to change?
Could you recommend a good restaurant near the hotel?
I'd like to book a table for two at eight o'clock, please.
Would it be possible to have a late checkout tomorrow?
I'm afraid the air conditioning in my room isn't working properly.
Could you call a taxi for me? I need to be at the station by nine.
Excuse me, is this seat taken? Would you mind if I sat here?
I need to exchange some currency. Where's the nearest bureau de change?
What time does the museum close? I'd like to visit this afternoon.
I seem to have lost my way. Could you point me in the right direction?
Is it within walking distance, or should I take a bus?
Thank you so much for your help. You've been very kind.
I'd like to walk you through the specifications of our new semi-trailer.
The lead time for this configuration would be approximately eight to ten weeks.
As you can see from the specifications, the payload capacity is fourteen tonnes.
Let me get back to you on that. I'll need to check with our engineering team.
We're looking at approximately three hundred units per month.
The chassis is made from high-strength steel for maximum durability.
Could you explain the warranty terms in more detail, please?
We offer a comprehensive after-sales service package.
I'd be happy to arrange a factory visit for you next month.
The fuel consumption has been reduced by fifteen percent compared to the previous model.
We've implemented several improvements based on customer feedback.
What payment terms would you be looking for on an order of this size?
I'll send you a revised quotation by the end of the week.
We'd need a thirty percent deposit to confirm the order.
The quality control process involves three separate inspections.
Could we schedule a video conference for next Tuesday afternoon?
I'm attaching the technical drawings for your reference.
We're confident that this solution will meet your requirements.
The prototype should be ready for testing within six weeks.
We need to discuss the logistics arrangements before we proceed.
I'll prepare a detailed proposal and have it ready by Friday.
The contract includes a penalty clause for late delivery.
We've been manufacturing trailers for over thirty years.
Our annual production capacity is approximately five thousand units.
Shall we take a short break and reconvene in fifteen minutes?
Shall we say around seven? That should give us enough time after the meeting.
I was wondering if you'd like to join us for dinner this evening.
That sounds lovely. I'd be delighted to come along.
I'm afraid I'll have to decline. I have another commitment that evening.
Would you mind if I invited a colleague to join us?
How was your flight? I hope you weren't too tired after the journey.
Is this your first time in England? What do you think of it so far?
The weather has been quite pleasant this week, hasn't it?
I've heard wonderful things about the Lake District. Have you been?
Would you like me to recommend some places to visit while you're here?
Cheers! Here's to a successful partnership.
I must say, the food here is absolutely delicious.
Could I have the bill, please? We'll split it between us.
Please, allow me. This one's on me.
That's very kind of you. I'll get the next one then.
I really enjoyed our conversation. We should do this again sometime.
It was lovely meeting you. Have a safe journey home.
I do apologise for being late. The traffic was absolutely dreadful.
Not to worry at all. These things happen.
I'm terribly sorry, but I didn't quite catch your name.
Would you excuse me for a moment? I need to make a quick phone call.
I couldn't help but notice you're reading a fascinating book.
I'm not entirely sure, but I believe the museum is closed on Mondays.
Do you happen to know if there's a good pub nearby?
I'd love to stay longer, but I really must be going.
Good morning. A flat white and a croissant, please.
Could I have that to take away, please?
Do you have any vegetarian options on the menu?
I'm afraid I'm allergic to nuts. Does this dish contain any?
The soup of the day sounds lovely. I'll have that, please.
Excuse me, I think there might be a mistake with my order.
Would you mind turning the heating up a bit? It's rather chilly in here.
I'm looking for a birthday present for my colleague. Any suggestions?
Do you have this in a larger size? This one's a bit too small.
Could I try this on, please? Where are the fitting rooms?
I'll take it. Could you gift wrap it for me, please?
I'm afraid this doesn't fit properly. Would I be able to exchange it?
I'd like to make an appointment to see the doctor, please.
I've been feeling under the weather for the past few days.
Could you recommend something for a headache, please?
I need to top up my phone. Where can I buy credit?
The Wi-Fi doesn't seem to be working. Could you check for me?
I'm sorry to bother you, but could you help me with something?
That's very helpful. I really appreciate your assistance.
I'm running a bit late. I should be there in about fifteen minutes.
I've left my umbrella on the train. Is there a lost property office?
Would you be able to keep an eye on my bag while I get a coffee?
I think there may have been a misunderstanding. Let me explain.
I'm not quite sure I follow. Could you explain that again?
It's been an absolute pleasure. I look forward to seeing you again soon.
